description:
The Florida Coalition Against Domestic Violence is a grassroots non-profit organization whose membership is comprised of individuals, shelters and advocacy groups sharing the goal of eliminating domestic violence. FCADV maintains Florida's 24-hour, toll free Domestic Violence Hotline and shares information contained in its resource library with the public. 

Note: This program may be able to serve victims of human trafficking.

###MON###
###COL###
name: FLORIDA COALITION AGAINST DOMESTIC VIOLENCE
